Class OZDWStatBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • OZDWStatBar
  • public class OZDWStatBar
extends greenfoot.Actor
    OZDWStatBar is a Greenfoot actor that displays a pair of stat bars with their individual features. The first stat bar is a rectangular bar that is intended to be used as an HP/Shield bar, but it can be used for other applicable uses. The other is a circular bar that displays a percentage value in the middle as well as some ticks to provide a visual representation of the percentage. It is intended to be an ability charge bar, but can also be used for other purposes. The two bars have their own separate values.

    The purpose of this class is to provide a well integrated statistical bar that can help provide visuals for their abilities and any type of numerical bar that is required. This can provide a programmer easy access to a stats bar that is typically used in a RPG game.

    This class contains accessor (getter) and setter (update) methods.

    Version:
    March 11, 2020
    Author:
    Daniel Wei & Owen Zhu

    • Constructor Detail

      • OZDWStatBar

        public OZDWStatBar()
        Creates a generic OZDWStatBar with default dimensions and values.

      • OZDWStatBar

        public OZDWStatBar​(int width,
                   int height,
                   int borderWidth,
                   int hpVal,
                   int maxHpVal,
                   int chargeVal,
                   int maxChargeVal)
        Creates an OZDWStatBar of the dimensions specified and with the values specified. All values must not be negative.
        Parameters:
        width - Width of the rectangular bar portion of the stat bar.
        height - Height of the rectangular bar portion of the stat bar (diameter of the circular bar will be twice this height).
        borderWidth - Width of the border surrounding the rectangular bar portion of the stat bar.
        hpVal - Initial/starting value for the rectangular bar.
        maxHpVal - Maximum possible value for the rectangular bar.
        chargeVal - Initial/starting value for the circular bar.
        maxChargeVal - Maximum possible value for the circular bar.

      • OZDWStatBar

        public OZDWStatBar​(int width,
                   int height,
                   int borderWidth,
                   int hpVal,
                   int maxHpVal,
                   int chargeVal,
                   int maxChargeVal,
                   greenfoot.Color filledColor,
                   greenfoot.Color emptyColor,
                   greenfoot.Color borderColor,
                   greenfoot.Color updateDownColor,
                   greenfoot.Color updateUpColor,
                   greenfoot.Color txtColor)
        Creates an OZDWStatBar with the dimensions and values specified. All values must not be negative. Colors are also specified but only apply to the rectangular bar portion.
        Parameters:
        width - Width of the rectangular bar portion of the stat bar.
        height - Height of the rectangular bar portion of the stat bar (diameter of the circular bar will be twice this height).
        borderWidth - Width of the border surrounding the rectangular bar portion of the stat bar.
        hpVal - Initial/starting value for the rectangular bar.
        maxHpVal - Maximum possible value for the rectangular bar.
        chargeVal - Initial/starting value for the circular bar.
        maxChargeVal - Maximum possible value for the circular bar.
        filledColor - Colour for the filled up portion of the rectangular bar.
        emptyColor - Colour for the empty portion of the rectangular bar.
        borderColor - Colour for the border surrounding the rectangular bar.
        updateDownColor - Colour for the value update animation for decreases in the rectangular bar's value.
        updateUpColor - Colour for the value update animation for increases in the rectangular bar's value
        txtColor - Colour for the rectangular bar's text display.

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act()
        Act - do whatever the OZDWStatBar wants to do. This method is called whenever the 'Act' or 'Run' button gets pressed in the environment.
        Overrides:
        act in class greenfoot.Actor

      • update

        public void update​(boolean updatingHp,
                   int newVal)
        Updates the OZDWStatBar's current value with a new value. Also updates the appearance of the OZDWStatBar accordingly.
        Parameters:
        updatingHp - True if the HP (rectangular) bar's values are being updated, false if the ability (circular) bar's values are being updated.
        newVal - New value to update the OZDWStatBar with.

      • update

        public void update​(boolean updatingHp,
                   int newVal,
                   int newMax)
        Updates the OZDWStatBar's current value and current maximum value with new values. Also updates the appearance of the OZDWStatBar accordingly.
        Parameters:
        updatingHp - True if the HP (rectangular) bar's values are being updated, false if the ability (circular) bar's values are being updated.
        newVal - New value to update the OZDWStatBar with.
        newMax - New maximum value to update the OZDWStatBar with.

        Gets the maximum charge value for this stat bar.
        Returns:
        int Maximum charge value (maxChargeVal)

        public int getMaxHpValue()
